_header: A loss of heal and liking / A body dressed to dying
_description: Verses in a Latin sermon — three short rhyming lines

BodLatTheD1.Transcription:
A losse of hele & lykyngA body dressede to dyingto a woman
                    petously pleynyng
BodLatTheD1.Editions:
Little,  Andrew George. 
             Franciscan Papers, Lists, and Documents.
         Manchester: Manchester UP, 1943: 248.
